Docs.summary: Parameters used as input for the PKIX CertPathValidator algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Java.Security.KeyStore keystore) cil managed

Docs.param: a KeyStore from which the set of most-trusted CAs will be populated
Docs.summary: Creates an instance of PKIXParameters that populates the set of most-trusted CAs from the trusted certificate entries contained in the specified KeyStore.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the keyStore is not initialized.
if keyStore does not contained any trusted certificate entry.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool AnyPolicyInhibited { get; set; }
member this.AnyPolicyInhibited : bool with get, set

Docs.param: true if the any policy OID is to be inhibited, false otherwise
Docs.summary: Checks whether the any policy OID should be processed if it is included in a certificate. -or- Sets state to determine if the any policy OID should be processed if it is included in a certificate.
Docs.value: true if the any policy OID is inhibited, false otherwise

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: a List of PKIXCertPathCheckers. May be null, in which case no additional checkers will be used.
Docs.summary: Returns the List of certification path checkers. -or- Sets a List of additional certification path checkers.
Docs.value: an immutable List of PKIXCertPathCheckers (may be empty, but not null)

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns an immutable List of CertStores that are used to find certificates and CRLs. -or- Sets the list of CertStores to be used in finding certificates and CRLs.
Docs.value: an immutable List of CertStores (may be empty, but never null)

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool ExplicitPolicyRequired { get; set; }
member this.ExplicitPolicyRequired : bool with get, set

Docs.param: true if explicit policy is to be required, false otherwise
Docs.summary: Checks if explicit policy is required. -or- Sets the ExplicitPolicyRequired flag.
Docs.value: true if explicit policy is required, false otherwise

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: a Set of initial policy OIDs in String format (or null)
Docs.summary: Returns an immutable Set of initial policy identifiers (OID strings), indicating that any one of these policies would be acceptable to the certificate user for the purposes of certification path processing. -or- Sets the Set of initial policy identifiers (OID strings), indicating that any one of these policies would be acceptable to the certificate user for the purposes of certification path processing.
Docs.value: an immutable Set of initial policy OIDs in String format, or an empty Set (implying any policy is acceptable). Never returns null.
